full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Title
Nitrogen Generators

### Reference Number
cb-343-6314955

### Amendment Number
2

### Solicitation Number
202401449/A

### Publication Date
2024-04-18

### Tender Closing Date
2024-05-10 14:00:00

### Amendment Date
2024-05-10

### Expected Contract Start Date
2024-05-17

### Expected Contract End Date
2024-03-31

### Tender Status
Expired

### UNSPSC Code
26111600 (Power Generators)

### Procurement Category
Goods and Services (GD)

### Notice Type
Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Procurement Method
Competitive - Open Bidding

### Selection Criteria
Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity
Worldwide

### Regions of Delivery
National Capital Region (NCR)

### Contracting Entity
Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)

### Contact Information
Alex Fraser
Alexander.Fraser@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
(343) 596-8226

### Tender Description

The RCMP Canadian Police College is seeking to purchase Nitrogen Generators, Whisper 0-80, 80I/min or Equivalent. On-site measurements for installation location are required.

### Security Requirements

The contractor's resources must be security cleared at the level of RCMP Facility Access Level 2 – FA2 with technical escort as verified by the Personnel Security Unit (PSU) of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP).

### Instructions to Tenderers

Tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at Shannon.Plunkett@rcmp-grc.gc.ca. Refer to the attached tender documents for further information.

### Important Notes

* Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Attachment

The tender documents are available at the following link: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36335/202401449-rfp-to-post_0.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36335/amendment-eng.pdf, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36335/amendment-fr.pdf, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites
